title: Rahu Transit in Fourth House: Inner Restlessness, Home Shifts, and Emotional Rewiring
summary: For Aquarius Ascendant, Rahu transiting the fourth house unsettles emotional security and domestic patterns. A strong urge to change residence, renovate, or redefine ‘home’ arises. Inner peace fluctuates, pushing you to seek comfort through unconventional choices or technology-driven living. Property matters can bring sudden opportunities alongside confusion; due diligence is essential. Family dynamics may feel unpredictable, requiring clear boundaries. When grounding practices replace impulsive moves, Rahu here helps redesign emotional foundations and modernize the sense of belonging.
closing: Rahu in the fourth house stabilizes life when innovation is balanced with emotional grounding.
